description_txt: stated on September 14, 2012 in a story on 630WPRO.com:
quote_txt: A poll conducted in Egypt revealed that 80 percent of Egyptians oppose receiving foreign aid from the United States.
footer: By C. Eugene Emery Jr. • September 26, 2012

description_txt: stated on August 20, 2012 in a state voters' pamphlet argument:
quote_txt: Says "One of the state’s largest governments made charging this tax one of their top priorities just this year."

description_txt: stated on September 24, 2012 in a press release from the Mitt Romney campaign:
quote_txt: "President Obama decided not to meet with Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu in New York."

description_txt: stated on September 21, 2012 in a mailer to voters:
quote_txt: Says Obama sent $450 million to China to build a wind farm in Texas.

description_txt: stated on September 21, 2012 in a tweet.:
quote_txt: Says Barack Obama has added $16 trillion to the national debt.

description_txt: stated on September 21, 2012 in a Spanish-language television ad:
quote_txt: College tuition "costs have risen by 25 percent under the Democrats."

description_txt: stated on June 18, 2012 in a speech in Austin:
quote_txt: Says scientists predict "sometime in the future, an event that will kill … somewhere between 80 and 90 million people."

description_txt: stated on September 12, 2012 in a TV ad:
quote_txt: Says Obama adviser David Plouffe took "large piles of cash" from a joint venture partner of a company owned by Iran’s Revolutionary Guard.

description_txt: stated on September 4, 2012 in on NRA ILA's website:
quote_txt: "Bill Nelson voted for a ban on millions of commonly owned firearms, which included many popular hunting and target rifles."

description_txt: stated on September 11, 2012 in a book:
quote_txt: "The truth is, Planned Parenthood does not provide mammograms. Planned Parenthood refers women to mammography providers, serving as the middlewoman, if you will."

description_txt: stated on September 20, 2012 in an interview on Univision:
quote_txt: "Fast and Furious" began under the Bush administration.

description_txt: stated on September 18, 2012 in a campaign ad:
quote_txt: Says Romney tax plan "could take away middle-class deductions for child care, mortgages and college tuition."

description_txt: stated on September 11, 2012 in a speech:
quote_txt: "We have more natural gas than Saudi Arabia has oil."

description_txt: stated on September 19, 2012 in an interview with NJToday:
quote_txt: Says "the governor is going around the state talking about [how] we should fund an income tax cut" that benefits higher income earners and not lower income earners

description_txt: stated on September 20, 2012 in a news release.:
quote_txt: "Tim Kaine announced he wants to raise taxes on everyone."

description_txt: stated on September 11, 2012 in a book:
quote_txt: "Obamacare will provide coverage for abortions, despite the president’s commitment that it would not."

description_txt: stated on September 24, 2012 in an election flier :
quote_txt: Barack Obama "refuses to acknowledge Jerusalem as the capital of Israel."

description_txt: stated on August 26, 2012 in an appearance on "Face the Nation" on CBS:
quote_txt: Says that in the U.S. House of Representatives "we’ve had bipartisan support for the repeal of Obamacare … for getting rid of cap and trade … for building the Keystone Pipeline."

description_txt: stated on August 9, 2012 in an interview:
quote_txt: U.S. House opponent Paul Ryan supports "cutting funding for veterans by 24 percent."

description_txt: stated on September 12, 2012 in an interview with Townsquare Media New Jersey:
quote_txt: Says the "number-one source" of illegal immigration "is people legally coming to the United States on a tourist visa or a student visa and then disappearing into the population and never being heard from again."

description_txt: stated on September 18, 2012 in a radio ad:
quote_txt: James Langevin "has received almost $20 million from taxpayers and special interests to use at his own discretion to supposedly champion Rhode Island’s needs."

description_txt: stated on September 13, 2012 in a campaign ad:
quote_txt: "Their New York casino deal was called ‘rigged’ and ‘corrupt.’"

description_txt: stated on September 7, 2012 in a newsletter update:
quote_txt: Says a voter-adopted constitutional amendment "instructed" a state board headed by Jerry Patterson to put $300 million in investment earnings into a fund supporting public school operations.

description_txt: stated on September 4, 2012 in Tennessee Republican Party web site posting:
quote_txt: President Obama campaign surrogate Maryland Gov. Martin O’Malley "acknowledged that we are not better off than we were four years ago."

description_txt: stated on September 19, 2012 in a campaign ad:
quote_txt: "Eight million Americans have dropped out of the work force since (Barack) Obama became president. ... The real unemployment rate is 19 percent."

description_txt: stated on September 21, 2012 in a campaign ad:
quote_txt: Says President Barack Obama is responsible for pending defense cuts.

description_txt: stated on September 12, 2012 in a TV ad:
quote_txt: Says U.S. Senate candidate Tommy Thompson "admitted" that Washington, D.C., "changed" him into an insider selling his influence to make millions from powerful special interests.

description_txt: stated on August 15, 2012 in a campaign mailer sent to New Boston residents in August 2012:
quote_txt: Says when Republicans took over the state legislature in 2010, New Hampshire’s tax rate for employers was 50th in the nation, and unemployment had more than doubled under Democrats.

description_txt: stated on September 6, 2012 in a news release:
quote_txt: The national debt of $16 trillion, is "enough to buy both the Cleveland Indians and Cincinnati Reds 1,918 times."

description_txt: stated on September 19, 2012 in a speech:
quote_txt: Says Barack Obama's comments indicate he "believes in redistribution" of wealth.
